body_html:
Hi @mingminzhen, 'deterministic' controls cuDNN convolution algorithm selection, so that only deterministic convolution algorithms are selected. This excludes some of the faster algorithms.

BTW, we haven't decided to make this a public API yet, so the signature of this function may change without warning.
body_text:
Hi @mingminzhen, 'deterministic' controls cuDNN convolution algorithm selection, so that only deterministic convolution algorithms are selected. This excludes some of the faster algorithms.
BTW, we haven't decided to make this a public API yet, so the signature of this function may change without warning.
body:
Hi @mingminzhen, 'deterministic' controls cuDNN convolution algorithm selection, so that only deterministic convolution algorithms are selected. This excludes some of the faster algorithms.

BTW, we haven't decided to make this a public API yet, so the signature of this function may change without warning.
